articles.title: Abortion rights groups launch multi-state court effort to stop or slow enforcement of abortion bans
articles.description: Abortion rights proponents have filed court actions in at least seven states seeking to block or slow the enforcement of abortion bans in the days since Friday's US Supreme Court ruling cleared the way for states to prohibit the procedure.

articles.title: US strikes al Qaeda-affiliated leader in Syria

articles.title: Weed users nearly 25% more likely to need emergency care and hospitalization
articles.description: Recreational cannabis use is linked to a increased risk of emergency room care and hospital admission, a new study finds.
articles.content:
Using recreational marijuana is associated with a higher risk of emergency room care and being hospitalized for any reason, a new study has found.

articles.title: John Eastman searched and had phone seized by federal agents last week, he says
articles.description: The FBI seized the phone of former President Donald Trump's election attorney John Eastman last week, according to a new court filing from the lawyer.

articles.title: National Right to Life eyes medication abortion restrictions as next step in post-Roe fight
